11.content: Naruto was the hero of the village after he defeated pain. He was elated to see that once unfriendly faces were now smiling and overjoyed to see him. Needless to say the fame went right to his head. I had once looked up to him. I was one of the masses in the crowd singing his praise. I use to call him boss. My name is Konohamaru Sarutobi, and this is how I became boss of a fifteen year old at the age of twelve. As I was saying fame had gotten to Naruto's head. We use to hang out and he use to help me train. But every time I try to say hi he ignores me, like I'm not worth his time. I had had enough. I tailed him and found that after his free ramen dinner he would head home alone to meditate. I had to come up with a plan to beat him. I knew at my current level I was no match for him. But like they say brain beats brawn every time. Naruto wasn't the brightest. My plan would work especially after finding my Grandpa's hidden scroll room. Being the Grandson of a former Hokage had it's perks. I trained six months to master the strength transfer jutsu. I found in my training that the transfer becomes permanent after two days. The spies from Akatsuki made for excellent test subjects. Now on to operation Boss promotion. Like a creature of habit Naruto after his dinner headed home to meditate. I laid in wait. "Boss I challenge you to a fight!" I called him out of his meditation. "Kid listen go home I'm busy." He said dismissing me. Him denying the dull allowed me to use the jutsu. If I had used it without challenging him death is the punishment. I had no intentions of dying. The jutsu was completed I felt overwhelming strength flow into me. Naruto realized too late after his Sage Mode vanished. I hit him in the stomach and much to my chagrin he peed himself. I teased him about his wetting he got mad and charged at me. I easily dodged and hit him again, knocking him out. He wet his pants while he was sleeping. I laughed so hard. I had originally planned on just beating him up but this was too much it was better. I stripped off his pants to change him and again I was greeted with a pleasant sight. This big hero wore tidey whiteys. "wake up!" I said throwing water in his face. He woke up and found out that I restrained him with cuffs. "To think I called you boss, idolized you, and yet here you are in a pair of wet baby briefs. Your pathetic. I think I'm gonna pay you back remember how just last week you called me a spoiled baby, well guess what you get to be one!" I told him. "Kono let me go, I'm sorry, we can train, we can.." "Shut up it's too late for apologies!" I yelled not wanting to listen to his pleas I shoved one of his socks in his mouth. "I'll be right back, don't you dare make a sound or else!" I warned. I taped the sock gag around his head to ensure that he didn't make a peep. I had to go get some supplies. I returned I found him struggling to free himself. He had fear in his eyes. "Naruto from now on your gonna be called Naru, cause your gonna be demoted from boss to baby." I told him. He shook his head and made some noises they were muffled by the gag. "Now don't fuss Boss Kono will take care of you." I said stripping him of his dampened briefs. I then proceeded to powder and diaper him. I removed his gag and he swore like a sailor. "Naru hush babys shouldn't use such language." I scolded while slipping a pacifier into his mouth. "Now before you spit that out, you should know I have a jutsu that can make you incontinent forever. Incontinent means that you will lose your potty training. Imagine talking to Sakura and then bam you poop your pants." Naruto gulped he submitted and began sucking on his pacifier. "There's a good boy." I said patting him on the head. A week later and I had Naruto excuse me Naru as my personal baby boy. But we did this in private. I was still livid at the humiliation Naru had caused me so I decided I had to get back at him. I planned on showing the whole village what their so called hero was.

"Well, if you two want to act like babies, I'll treat you like babies." Tsunade said, which made Konohamaru and Naruto light up in glee. "Let me just get the beds ready and then we'll go over the rules." Tsunade left the room for a bit and came back with babyish sheets and plastic covers, in case they soak the bed. The sheets were white with teddy bears, blocks, and bottles printed all over the sheets. Tsunade, after she was done with the arrangements, walked over to the boys.

6. Never change yourselves, I'll will always be the one to change you, or one of my assistants.

1451.content:
"We can rest up here for now" Said Kakashi. Kakashi and Naruto were on a two man mission in the Land of Water for a collection of a special package. "Sensei will you please tell me what this special package is? Kakashi sighed, "Fine Naruto, this package is a cursed power suit which could be dangerous in the hands of the enemy, supposedly it could make the user incredibly powerful and we have a responsibility to keep it safe back in Konoha". This only excited Naruto further and tempted him as well.

After a short rest Kakashi decided they should start moving again and shortly they made it to a small Inn in the woods, Kakashi paid for a room and the two waited there. Not long after there was a knock at the door and an Anbu agent revealed themselves. "Here is the package, we have been followed and are ready for an attack, can you join us Kakashi?" He asked. Kakashi nodded and handed the package to Naruto, "Keep this safe Naruto and don't leave this room, I'll be back shortly".

Naruto couldn't contain himself and opened the package to look at the suit. It was a light blue body suit which cut off at short sleeves and just below the waist like a onesie, it seemed to have a zip in the back to put it on and it came with a note that read: 'Make sure no clothes worn underneath suit'. Not wasting any time Naruto dressed down naked and slipped his legs into the suit, as he pulled it up his legs he felt the soft fabric stretch to his body, it also seemed to have a soft cushiony undergarment sewn into the suit. Naruto threaded his arms into the suit and reached for the zip and sealed himself into the suit.

As soon as the suit was zipped up the suit a white glowing pattern showed up confirmed the suit was active. As to test out the suit Naruto began to muster his chakra and began preparations for a Rasengan. Almost instantly a Rasengan appeared in Naruto's hand even without a clone, Naruto being surprised attempted the same again in his other hand and instantly generated another Rasengan.

Being very happy with the results so far Naruto decided to push it further, he summoned as many clones as he could fit in the room and had every clone build a Rasengan in each hand. Suddenly every clone had two Rasengans each much to Naruto's pleasure and just as soon as it happened the clones disappeared. A confused Naruto stood in the room as out of nowhere the cushioned seat of the suit grew in size. The padding kept enlarging until it slowly came to a stop as it bulged out very far and forced Naruto to a waddle.

Almost immediately afterwards Kakashi returned to the room, looked Naruto up and down and sighed. "I'm very disappointed in you Naruto, I thought I could trust you with this. Well I guess than since you're wearing it I'll tell you how the Diaper Suit works", "D-Diaper Suit!?" shouted Naruto. Naruto realised that the swollen cushioned padding was actually a diaper, he reached for the zip which he could no longer find. "The suit will grant you a massive chakra reserve and ease of using jutsu, however for however much you rely on the power the diaper increases in size. When the suit is lending you power or you have not yet paid it for its use the zip will disappear and not allow you to remove it. The way you can reduce the size of the diaper or pay it back is by either wetting or messing the diaper, don't worry though any damage you do to the diaper will fade over time.

Naruto was on the verge of tears, obviously not wanting to use a diaper, and Kakashi motioned towards the door, "Get ready lets go back to Konoha". Naruto bagged his shirt and underwear, slipped on his jacket over the suit and tugged his trousers up, he had difficulty getting it over the bulge of the diaper and even after he was successful he only looked more like he had a diaper on anyway
1451.title: The Power Suit

Kakashi recovered a message from the bird as it flew back to its sender, Kakashi read the message and then destroyed it, turning to Naruto. "Sorry Naruto I have been issued another mission, this has to be put on hold, return to Konoha but do not give the suit to the Hokage until I return, understood?", Naruto whined "Yes Sensei...".

Kakashi made haste and vanished into the woodlands quickly as Naruto continued alone. Not long afterwards Naruto made it back to Konoha and quickly check in at the gates, noticing he was attracting attention with his obvious diaper he made it back to his apartment as soon as possible. Naruto breathed a sigh of relief as he made it to safety in his apartment, removing all of his clothes save the suit.

Naruto rushed to his bathroom, tensing his bladder as hard as he could. Realising he couldn't use the toilet in his condition the flood gates burst and Naruto fully wet the diaper until he could wet no more. The diaper took its time absorbing the pee as Naruto could feel it slosh around in his diaper, urgency met him however as Naruto could feel his stomach rumbling.

" NARUTO UZUMAKI YOU COME BACK HERE''! " HA HA YOU'LL NEVER TAKE ME ALIVE"! Naruto laughed in glee as he made another one of his famous getaways. Now normally Naruto usually wouldn't pull as many pranks , and mischief ever since he had become a official genin . However, his childish side had gotten the best of him that day , and he just couldn't resist. Naruto had put a chemical in the water supply that had turned peoples hair into a bright neon orange. And just , for the heck of it he had covered every building in plastic wrap , and put petroleum jelly on rooftops doorknobs , and anywhere he could find. Naruto was having the time of his life . Of course the villagers , and many shinobi were angry at Naruto which was why he was running . However, as Naruto ran he had forgotten the fact that many of the rooftops were covered in plastic wrap , and petroleum jelly , and when he leapt unto the tall building he lost all balance. With eyes wide , and deep shock Naruto tried to grab onto something , but his hands only slipped , and he couldn't focus his chakara in time to help him from the high fall.
The Angry shinobi all stopped in shock , and tried to run , and catch Naruto , however, the distance was to great. Naruto screamed . And in the blink of an eye a flash of silver ran faster than lightning passing the slow shinobi , and villagers , and as Narutos figure began to descend even further . The flash of silver swooped the small child into a secure hold. Everyone sighed in relief . And all who had watched the scene take place quickly gathered around the figure holding the last uzumaki who was none other than Kakashi Hatake. And Just from the look in his eye you could sense worry , but above all anger , and even a hint of killer intent. The man was beyond furious.

Kakashi glanced at him , and said.
